title: Given x'(t) and x(0), find x(1)

content.question:
A particle moves on the curve y=ln x so that the x-component has velocity <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="x prime of t equals t plus 1">

 At time t=0, the particle is at the point (1, 0). At time t=1, the particle is at the point
